subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Sachin Tendulkar of India failed to make the 100th international century of his career. His exit helped England seize control at Lord’s in London on the third day of the first of four Tests.
snippet: Sachin Tendulkar of India failed to make the 100th international century of his career. His exit helped England seize control at Lord’s in London on the third day of the first of four Tests.
